about_caroline_paragraphs: Caroline, Founder of HABC & Beauty, was born and raised in Kenya, where she built her name as a celebrity hairstylist in over 15 years; in 2019 she moved to the USA (Texas), pursued her passion by attending cosmetology school, and graduated before founding HABC & Beauty.

With over 21 years of experience in the hair industry, Caroline continues to bring her expertise, creativity, and artistry to every client she serves. She specializes in wigs, sew-ins, chemical treatments, extensions, and locs, always with a focus to enhance the beauty, confidence, and individuality of every woman who sits in her chair.

Caroline’s dedication, skill, and genuine care have made HABC & Beauty a trusted salon for quality, comfort, and transformation. Her exceptional service has earned her five-star ratings across all platforms, reflecting the satisfaction and loyalty of her clients.
Her mission is simple, to help every client look and feel their absolute best.

process_steps.title: Consultation
process_steps.description: We listen to your vision and assess your needs to create a customized plan. This is where we discuss your goals, preferences, and any concerns to ensure we're aligned on your desired outcome.

process_steps.title: Personalization
process_steps.description: Our experts tailor treatments and techniques specifically for your unique features, hair type, and lifestyle. We consider everything from your daily routine to special occasions.

process_steps.title: Transformation
process_steps.description: Experience the artistry as we bring your vision to life with precision and care. Using premium products and advanced techniques, we create stunning results that enhance your natural beauty.

process_steps.title: After Care
process_steps.description: Receive expert guidance on maintaining your look and scheduling follow-ups. We provide personalized recommendations for at-home care and products to keep your style looking fresh.
